Texts.Chs:
While dark magic is scary these tiny horses can only use light, and apparently powerful, magic, literally.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;天赋^reset;:
   能量x^green;1.3^reset;, 伤害 x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% E. Regen
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Cosmic

^orange;环境^reset;:
  Grassy/Wooded:  能量x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;3^reset;% 速度 & 跳跃 and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Alien/Heck/Flesh: -^red;34^reset;% E. Regen, Damage &  能量x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;:
  Wands: +^green;8^reset;% Defense, +^green;25^reset;% E. Regen
  Staves: 伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% 暴击几率
  Energy: 伤害 x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;:  -^red;50^reset;% Shadow, -^red;15^reset;% Radiation
  Defense x^red;0.7^reset;
Texts.Eng:
The unicorns are tricky of the bunch. Despite being frailer than their kin and their weakness to going mad from revelations, their magical powers are quite great. They value themselves as craftsponies more, however, that magic being in most case mundane.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.3^reset;, Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% E. Regen
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Aether

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Aether/Crystalline: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Atropus: -^red;10^reset;% E. Regen, Damage and Energy x^red;0.9^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Mastery: +^cyan;10^reset;% Wands and Staves, +^cyan;7^reset;% Energy

^orange;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Defense x^red;0.9^reset;.
  ^red;25% more suspectible to madness effects, harder to cure madness.^reset;

^orange;Resists^reset;:
 +^green;20^reset;% Cosmic, +^green;5^reset;% Fire, Ice, Electric, Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Shadow, -^red;15^reset;% Radiation.
